info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 1:13PM MDT until June 18 at 1:45PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: The National Weather Service in Missoula has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Missoula County in west central Montana... North central Ravalli County in west central Montana... * Until 145 PM MDT. * At 112 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Victor, or 14 miles north of Hamilton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. Winds gusting to 40 mph and heavy rain are also expected. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Lolo, Stevensville, Victor, Florence and Bell Crossing. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
